member.summary: Translates a value named 'valueName' to a Rtf Control word that specifies a unit, enum, bool or color. If it is a unit, twips are assumed as RtfUnit.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RendererBase.TranslateBool(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Translates a value named 'valueName' to a Rtf Control word that specifies a Boolean and devides in two control words. If the control word in false case is simply left away, you can also use the Translate function as well.

member.summary: Indicates whether the specified Unicode character is available in the Ansi code page 1252.

member.summary: Writes the number as hex value. Only numbers <= 255 are allowed.

member.summary: Writes a blank in paragraph text.

member.summary: Writes a semicolon as separator e.g. in in font tables.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the given string as control word optionally with a star.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the given string as control word with a star followed by a space.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the given string as control word with a star followed by a space.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given string as control word.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given string as control word. Many control words must be terminated by a space. In some cases (e.g. for the non-breaking space "\~") there must be no space. Set markAsControl to true for automatic padding of a blank, or false to suppress automatic padding. The default (for overloads without markAsControl) is true.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the given string and integer as control word / value pair followed by a space.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given strings as control word / value pair.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControl(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given strings as control word / value pair. Many control word / value pairs must be terminated by a space. In some cases (e.g. for the non-breaking space "\~") there must be no space. Set markAsControl to true for automatic padding of a blank, or false to suppress automatic padding. The default (for overloads without markAsControl) is true.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControlWithStar(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given string and integer as control word / value pair with a star.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControlWithStar(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the given string and integer as control word / value pair followed by a space.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.RtfWriter.WriteControlWithStar(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given string and integer as control word / value pair with a star.

member.summary: Base class for Renderers that render shapes (images, textframes, charts) to RTF.

member.summary: Starts the area for a common shape description in RTF.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderShapeAttributes
member.summary: Renders attributes that belong to a shape.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderFillFormat
member.summary: Renders the fill format of the shape.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderLineFormat
member.summary: Renders the line format of the shape.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderTopPosition
member.summary: Renders the shape's Left attribute by setting the \posv, \shptop and \shpbottom RTF controls.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderLeftPosition
member.summary: Renders the shape's Left attribute by setting the \posh, \shpleft and \shpright RTF controls.

member.summary: Gets the user defined shape height.

member.summary: Gets the user defined shape width.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderInParagraph
member.summary: A shape that shall be placed between its predecessor and its successor must be embedded in a paragraph.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderParagraphAttributes
member.summary: Renders the dummy paragraph's attributes.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderParagraphDistances
member.summary: Renders the dummy paragraph's space before and space after attributes.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderParagraphAlignment
member.summary: Renders the dummy paragraph's Alignment taking into account the shape's Left property.

member.summary: Renders the RelativeHorizontal attribute.

member.summary: Renders the RelativeVerticalattribute.

member.summary: Renders the WrapFormat.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderParagraphIndents
member.summary: Renders the dummy paragraph's left indent.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderTopBottom
member.summary: Renders (and calculates) the \shptop and \shpbottom controls in RTF.

member.summary: Aligns the given top and bottom position so that ShapePosition.Top results in top position = 0.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.RenderLeftRight
member.summary: Renders (and calculates) the \shpleft and \shpright controls in RTF.

member.summary: Aligns the given left and right position so that ShapePosition.Left results in left position = 0.

member.summary: Renders a name value pair as shape property to RTF.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.StartNameValuePair(System.String)
member.summary: Renders name as the beginning of a shape's name value pair to RTF. Used in the order StartNameValuePair <value rendering> EndNameValuePair.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.EndNameValuePair
member.summary: Renders the end of a shape's name value pair. Used in the order StartNameValuePair <value rendering> EndNameValuePair.

member.summary: Translates a value as a shape's name value pair to RTF.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.StartDummyParagraph
member.summary: Starts a dummy paragraph to put a shape in, which is wrapped TopBottom style.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.ShapeRenderer.EndDummyParagraph
member.summary: Ends a dummy paragraph to put a shape in, which is wrapped TopBottom style.

member.name: T:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.StyleAndFormatRenderer
member.summary: Base class to render objects that have a style and a format attribute (currently cells, paragraphs).

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.StyleAndFormatRenderer.RenderStyleAndFormat
member.summary: Renders format and style. Always call EndFormatAndStyleAfterContent() after the content was written.

member.name: M:MigraDoc.RtfRendering.StyleAndFormatRenderer.EndStyleAndFormatAfterContent
member.summary: Ends the format and style rendering. Always paired with RenderStyleAndFormat().
